snippet.title: Night Trap - 25th Anniversary Edition - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The original live-action video game classic is back after 25 years for PS4, Steam & Xbox One.

http://www.nighttrap25.com
http://www.screamingvillains.com

Night Trap tells the story of five teenage girls spending the weekend at the Martin home. As a member of the Special Control Attack Team, your job is to monitor the home and protect the girls using an intricate system of cameras and traps as it is being invaded by vampires.

Coming Soon 2017.
Developed by Screaming Villains.
